title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: The ControlExampleText component emits a beeping sound when selecting SWT.MULTI. This behavior is unexpected and likely unintentional.
OB: After choosing SWT.MULTI, the bell sound is heard when clicking on other buttons as well.
EB: Build F1 (20020521)Win2K (unclear if this is SWT or just the SWT Example)
SR: In the SWT example ControlExample, navigate to the Text tab and select StylesSWT.SINGLE. Then, select StylesSWT.MULTI and observe the beeping sound.
